meta.title: Number Place - Sudoku
meta.description: Challenge yourself with our Sudoku puzzle game. Choose from multiple difficulty levels and improve your logical thinking skills.
meta.keywords: sudoku, number puzzle, brain training, logic game

overview.title: Overview
overview.content: This Sudoku app is a simple puzzle game that anyone can enjoy. Choose from three difficulty levels: 'Easy' for beginners, 'Normal' for a more engaging experience, and 'Hard' for those seeking a challenge. Starting a new puzzle is as simple as pressing the 'New Game' button, and you can check your answers with the 'Check Solution' button. With a user-friendly design that works well on smartphones and tablets, it's perfect for brain training during your free time.

steps.title: Select a Difficulty Level
steps.description: When you start the app, choose from 'Easy', 'Normal', or 'Hard'. If you're a beginner, 'Easy' is the best place to start.

steps.title: Tap the New Game Button
steps.description: Press the 'New Game' button to generate a new Sudoku puzzle. Each time you'll get a different puzzle, so you can play endlessly.

steps.title: Check Your Solution
steps.description: Once you've filled in all the squares, tap the 'Check Solution' button. If you're correct, you'll proceed to the completion screen; if not, you can identify errors and try again.

questions.question: Q. Is this Sudoku app free to use?
questions.answer: A. Yes, basic gameplay is available for free.

questions.question: Q. Can I use it offline?
questions.answer: A. Yes, once downloaded, you can play without an internet connection.

questions.question: Q. Is there a hint feature?
questions.answer: A. The current version doesn't include hints, but this keeps the app simple and easy to use.

questions.question: Q. Are there ads?
questions.answer: A. The free version may display some ads. We've designed them to be as unobtrusive as possible for your comfort.

questions.question: Q. Can I change the difficulty level mid-game?
questions.answer: A. You can't change difficulty during a game, but you can select your preferred level when starting a new game.
